title: 100% winrate on Soraka
body:
Small sample size, but 7-0 for the season is damn good for someone in their promos.

Pick the goat and be a passive healbot. Stay very safely in position until the focus is guaranteed off you. NO POKING. Save silence for key moments, like Leblanc engaging in so she can't W out.

Take all the regen masteries, buy some AP so you scale.

Freelo
